company.name: Telegram engagement is broken. We're here to fix it

mainHero.title: NABE
mainHero.description: Scale engagement in your telegram community through crypto rewards

product.title: Telegram engagement is broken. NABE fixes it

items.title: Engage. Earn
items.description: Karma points enhance sense of contribution. NABE takes it to another level. Now, your community can earn for their efforts in a tangible manner.

items.title: Flexible engagements. Flexible rewards
items.description: Reward your community with multiple rewards. Pay in your native token, or any other tokens you can distribute

features.title: TURN YOUR COMMUNITY INTO A DAO POWERHOUSE
features.subtitle: /reward <telegram_username> 10 BNB
features.description: Reward your community with simple commands in a transparent way. An engaged community is a successful project

items.name: Cross community
items.description: Monitor contributor engagements across communities. Trust the most valuable contributors with the most rewards

items.name: Active community
items.description: Put an end to inactive telegram groups, where no one wants to invest effort in the project

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
